alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 5:30PM CST until December 14 at 8:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR HARRISON COUNTY... At 530 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Long Beach, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, St. Martin, D`iberville, Lyman, Saucier and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 19 and 47. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
